parameters.name: ApplicationIds
parameters.description: Set of application IDs for the private access policy. Up to 100 application IDs can be entered. Required when **ApplicationType** is **Application**. Mutually exclusive with **TagIds**.

parameters.name: ApplicationType
parameters.description:
Application type of the private access policy. Values:
- **Application**: Application.
- **Tag**: Tag.

parameters.name: CustomUserAttributes
parameters.description: Set of custom user groups for the private access policy. Required when the user group type is **Custom**. Mutually exclusive with the user group ID set. Up to 10 custom user groups can be entered.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: Description of the private access policy. The length is 1 to 128 characters, supporting Chinese and uppercase and lowercase English letters, and can include numbers, periods (.), underscores (_), hyphens (-), and spaces.

parameters.name: DeviceAttributeAction
parameters.description:
The execution policy for not meeting the security baseline. Values:

- **Block**: Block.
- **Observe**: Observe.

parameters.name: DeviceAttributeId
parameters.description: The ID of the security baseline policy.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Name of the private access policy. The length is 1 to 128 characters, supporting Chinese and uppercase and lowercase English letters, and can include numbers, periods (.), underscores (_), and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: PolicyAction
parameters.description:
Action of the private access policy. Values:
- **Block**: Block.
- **Allow**: Allow.

parameters.name: Priority
parameters.description: The priority of the private access policy. The number 1 indicates the highest priority. Range: 1~1000, with the maximum value being the total number of private access policies.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the private access policy. Values:
- **Enabled**: Enabled.
- **Disabled**: Disabled.

parameters.name: TagIds
parameters.description: Set of tag IDs for the private access policy. Up to 100 tag IDs can be entered. Required when **ApplicationType** is **Tag**. Mutually exclusive with **ApplicationIds**.

parameters.name: TriggerTemplateId
parameters.description: The trigger template ID.

parameters.name: TrustedProcessGroupIds
parameters.description: The ID of the trusted process group.

parameters.name: TrustedProcessStatus
parameters.description:
The switch status of the trusted process. Values:
- **Enabled**: Enabled.
- **Disabled**: Disabled.

parameters.name: TrustedSoftwareIds
parameters.description: The ID of the trusted software.

parameters.name: UserGroupIds
parameters.description: Set of user group IDs for the private access policy. Required when the user group type is **Normal**. Mutually exclusive with the custom user group set. Up to 2000 user group IDs can be entered.

parameters.name: UserGroupMode
parameters.description:
User group type of the private access policy. Values:
- **Normal**: Normal user group.
- **Custom**: Custom user group.

parameters.name: ValidFrom
parameters.description: The start time when the zero trust policy takes effect, represented as a timestamp in seconds.

parameters.name: ValidTimeStatus
parameters.description: Switch status for effective time. Values: - **Enabled**: On. - **Disabled**: Off.

parameters.name: ValidUntil
parameters.description: The expiration time of the zero trust policy, in seconds timestamp.
